/Share/system/openmpi-185/bin/mpicxx  -Wall -Wno-uninitialized -Wno-deprecated-declarations -Wsign-compare -pthread  -fopenmp -O3 -DNDEBUG  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/thunder_resize.dir/appsrc/thunder_resize.cpp.o  -o app/thunder_resize -Wl,-rpath,/Share/home/yli/personSys/lib /Share/home/yli/personSys/lib/libfftw3.so /Share/home/yli/personSys/lib/libfftw3_threads.so /Share/home/yli/personSys/lib/libgsl.so /Share/home/yli/personSys/lib/libgslcblas.so -lm -ldl libthuem.a /Share/home/yli/personSys/lib/libfftw3.so /Share/home/yli/personSys/lib/libfftw3_threads.so /Share/home/yli/personSys/lib/libgsl.so /Share/home/yli/personSys/lib/libgslcblas.so -lm -ldl
